Audio.Locality: Estacao Ecologica de Jatai - Luis Antonio, Sao Paulo State
Audio.Author: Bruno Arantes de Andrade Bueno
Audio.Comments: Recorded at the Ecological Station's main facilities site. Apparently, the two individuals were singing in response to the presence of a Plush-crested Jay that was moving on branches below them (no more than 2m away at the same tree, 3m off the ground). A pair of Rufous Hornero also approached the Great Kiskadees but did not sing. The Plush-crested Jay didn't vocalize either.bird-seen:yesplayback-used:no
